entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023
